metadata.title: CVE-2017-12867 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The SimpleSAML_Auth_TimeLimitedToken class in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.14 andearlier allows attackers with access to a secret token to extend itsvalidity period by manipulating the prepended time offset.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12867` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.14.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
